column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start a Spy School
#Text=Do you have a spy club already , but need something else in the club ?
#Text=Or do you need to just DO something fun to pass the time ?
#Text=Either way , here 's how you make a successful spy school ...
#Text=( just so you know , this article is meant to be for kids )
#Text=Steps
#Text=If you do n't have one , start a spy club !
#Text=They usually have 3-6 people in them .
#Text=You can have a big army or a small group of spies .
#Text=Here are the jobs you will need to assign :
#Text=President :
#Text=This is the main leader spy .
#Text=You can have just one or , if your group is big , you can even have a small staff of 3-5 people .
#Text=Lone Spy : This is the spy who spies the most .
#Text=This spy should be allowed around town already .
#Text=Scout :
#Text=This spy searches out the spying area for tiny cameras , hidden weapons , etc.
#Text=This stuff you will probably only find if you have an enemy spy club .
#Text=Computer Spy :
#Text=Gets info from web and keeps track of it in a notebook .
#Text=Conclusion
#Text=Spy : figures out things .
#Text=Trainees : rookie spies who are being trained .
#Text=Have everybody come up with a spy name ( Agent ______ ) .
#Text=Finally , let 's get down to the school .
#Text=If you have a staff , they will be teachers .
#Text=If you do not have a staff then choose a few advanced spies .
#Text=Make the arrangements .
#Text=Who will teach defense/attack classes ?
#Text=Who will teach about disguising ?
#Text=Have at LEAST one person in your club take karate .
#Text=They will be the defense/attack teacher .
#Text=This is an optional step .
#Text=If there is no karate person then just teach simple punching , kicking , and slapping routines .
#Text=For more advice , add cathrinegrace101 on moshi monsters and send her a message on her pinboard .
#Text=Cathrinegrace101 is me .
#Text=Optional :
#Text=make a form of money , have a spy store with gadgets , and reward people with that form of money , and they get to shop in the store with it .
#Text=For more info , contact cathrinegrace101 on moshi monsters .
#Text=Have an official place for the school .
#Text=Make a time every week for spy school- YOU get to choose how many times you have it per week .
#Text=I would say only about 3 times , as spies need breaks , and they need time for homework/fun .
#Text=If you want , you can occasionally assign homework .
#Text=Only something that would take five or ten minutes though .
#Text=Spies do not like wasting time .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Eventually , you WILL get caught on a mission .
#Text=On missions , always have an excuse/Plan B. Your friends may get mad if you have the school too often , or if the homework is long/hard .
#Text=They WILL quit if they get too mad !
#Text=if they get mad at all , cut down on the spy school and spy homework !
